item.title: Ether-1 ECP Markdown Template
item.description: Markdown Template for Ether-1 ECP (Ether-1 Community Proposal) This is a simple markdown template for submitting ECPs to the Ether-1 Project Official GitHub Repository, which may be found here.

item.title: Welcome to Goose-Tech
item.description: Welcome to my new website! Thanks for visiting goosetech.pro! For starters, this site will slowly begin featuring new content and additional pages.
